borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Removal of conditions 9, 10 and 11 (Parking Permit) of planning permission ref: 2021/00281/VAR granted 1st June 2021 for the 'Variation of conditions 9, 10 and 11 of planning permission ref: 2020/03164/VAR granted 26th January 2021 for the 'Variation of conditions 9, 10 and 11 of planning permission ref: 2019/02438/FUL granted 30th October 2019 for the 'Erection of an additional floor at roof level; erection of a wall and glazed screening around the flat roof at first floor level in connection with its use as a roof terrace; installation of two doors to rear elevation at first floor level to provide access to the roof terrace; conversion of the existing two bedroom self-contained flat into 2 x 1 bedroom self-contained flats.' Amendments to allow the occupiers of Flat A to apply for street parking permits.' Amendments to include re-naming of Flats A and B into Flat C and D, and re-allocate entitlement of parking permit from Flat D to Flat C and alteration of the wording to conditions 9 and 11 to reflect parking permit scheme' to allow occupiers of the new residential unit (Flat D) to apply for street parking permits.
